briefdescription.para: Fired when the drop-down portion of the control is displayed.
Fired when the user clicks the dropdown button at the right edge of the control.
Fired when the drop-down portion of the control is closed.
Fired when the content of the editable portion of the control is painted.
Gets or sets the background color to use for this control.
Hides the BackgroundImage property on the designer.
Hides the BackgroundImageLayout property on the designer.
Determines whether to draw the control with visual styles.
Opens or closes the dropdown portion of the control.
Creates a new instance of DropDownControlBaSE.
Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.

simplesect.para: true if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, falSE.

briefdescription.para: Raises the DropDown event.

parameterdescription.para: The System.EventArgs instance containing the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the DropDownButtonClick event.

parameterdescription.para: The System.EventArgs instance containing the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the DropDownClosed event.

parameterdescription.para: The System.EventArgs instance containing the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.FontChanged event.

parameterdescription.para: An T:System.EventArgs that contains the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus event.

parameterdescription.para: An T:System.EventArgs that contains the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus event.

parameterdescription.para: An T:System.EventArgs that contains the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseClick event.

parameterdescription.para: An T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs that contains the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown event.

parameterdescription.para: A T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs that contains the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter event.

parameterdescription.para: An T:System.EventArgs that contains the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave event.

parameterdescription.para: An T:System.EventArgs that contains the event data.

briefdescription.para: Repaints the control when the mouse is moved over the control.
Raises the E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp event.

parameterdescription.para: A T:System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs that contains the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint event.

parameterdescription.para: A T:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs that contains the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the PaintContent event.

parameterdescription.para: The System.Forms.Controls.DropDownPaintEventArgs instance containing the event data.

briefdescription.para: Raises the E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged event.

parameterdescription.para: An T:System.EventArgs that contains the event data.

briefdescription.para: Determines the state in which to render the dropdown button portion of the control (when using visual styles).
Determines the state in which to render the dropdown button portion of the control (when not using visual styles).
Gets the bounds of the textbox portion of the control by subtracting the dropdown button bounds from the client rectangle.
Determines the state in which to render the textbox portion of the control (when using visual styles).
Sets the fixed height of the control, based on the font size.
Abstract base class for a control which behaves like a dropdown but does not contain logic for displaying a popup window.
